subject: Hello, I'm sorry for this kind
body:
Hello, I'm sorry for this kind of contact.  I just feel to contact you
because I thought you were the person I needed.  I don't know you and
you don't know me, but the Spirit of God has brought me to you.
Anyway, my name is Mrs. Laddie Jones. I live in northern Massachusetts
state USA.  I'm
suffering from a serious illness, which has condemned me to certain
death, It is throat cancer that I have been suffering from for years. And
According to my severally diagnosis from many hospitals, It has been
discovered that I can never be cured. between God and man. So I decided
to discharge all my personal belongings to the living. before I face
death. I have an amount of 58.5 million USD that I would like to
donate to a reliable and honest person so that he can make good
use of it. I own a red oil import company in Germany, and I lost my
husband 20 years ago which affected me a lot and I was not able to
remarry until today, I  had no children.  I want to give this amount as
a gift before I die Because my days are numbered due to the presence
of this disease for which I had no cure but a sedative to relieve my
pain.  I would like to ask you if you can benefit from this donation
of this 58.5 million USD.
If you are interested forward your information such as:
YOUR FULL NAME________
YOUR HOME ADDRESS______
YOUR NEAREST AIRPORT ADDRESS_____
YOUR ID CARD
________________
YOUR EMAIL ADDRESS_________
Forward the above-requested information directly to my personal Gmail or
here (
mrsladyj009@gmail.com
)

subject: Re: Hello, I'm sorry for this kind
body:
Dear Mrs. Laddie Jones,

I'm deeply moved by your message and I'm sorry to hear about your health condition. However, as a representative of the Holy Bagel Community, I must inform you that we are not in a position to accept personal donations.

We suggest that you consider donating to established charitable organizations who can ensure that your funds will be used for the benefit of those in need.

May God bless you and give you strength during this difficult time.

Best wishes,
Rose
